backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister managing listings, user and seller profiles, with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for documentation or build planning.
frontend/.env: Environment variables defining Google verification token and the configured public base URL.
frontend/.env.example: Template showing required environment variables for Google verification and optional public base URL.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template including SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, JSON-LD, and runtime fallback for public URL.
frontend/public/googleb1147599673a3710.h: Google Search Console verification HTML file.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing homepage, publishing page, and profile page URLs.
frontend/public/static-html-example.html: Standalone static HTML example demonstrating serving custom pages from the public folder.
frontend/scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs: Generates a sitemap.xml based on predefined routes and an environment-driven base URL.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app's router, routes, and layout, then renders the router within a theming provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for session clearing and retrying.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays the logo and mascot images in a responsive header layout.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Shows an empty-state message with optional action button for user interactions.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Renders a centered loading spinner with a short loading message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/listings/Categor: Renders selectable category buttons to filter listings.
frontend/src/components/listings/ImageUp: Handles client-side image uploads as data URLs, displaying previews and allowing removal.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a listing preview card with image, title, price, and quantity.
Form for creating or editing listings with fields, presets, validation, and image upload.
Shows a grid of ListingCards or fallback loading/empty states based on data.
frontend/src/components/listings/listing: Provides predefined listing templates with titles, descriptions, prices, and quantities.
frontend/src/components/sellers/SellerDi: Fetches and displays a seller's display name with a loading fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateLi: Mutation hook to create a listing and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateSe: Mutation hook to create a seller profile and refresh related queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeactiva: Provides a mutation to deactivate a listing and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveUser: Mutation to save the caller's user profile and refresh the current profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdateLi: Mutation to update a listing by ID and invalidate listing-related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches the current user's profile once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsSeller.t: Checks whether the current actor is a seller.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListingDet: Fetches detailed data for a single listing by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListings.t: Loads all listings from all sellers using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMyListings: Fetches listings owned by the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSellers.ts: Retrieves a seller profile for a given principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and context exposure.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays listings with search and category filtering on the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows full listing details, images, seller info, and owner actions like deactivation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page that handles user authentication, profile setup, saving profiles, creating seller profiles, and displaying user listings.
frontend/src/pages/PublishingSharePage.t: Page providing deployment URLs and shareable links with clipboard copy actions and hosting information.
frontend/src/pages/SellCreateListingPage: Page for authenticated users to create new listings using a form and submit them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SellEditListingPage.t: Page for listing owners to edit existing listings, with ownership checks and update submission.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Utility for parsing backend canister errors and mapping them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Utility for resolving the appâ€™s public URL and the current deployment origin.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-based persisted params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for implementing custom domain support, configurable canonical URLs, sitemap updates, and SEO metadata. Lists existing features, a pending request for custom domain setup, and overall project metadata.
